title: Innovators must provide proof and evidence | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: and anyone claiming because you will find so many people coming to you and saying this is Haram this is Haram this is Haram anyone who claims that something is Haram he must provide the evidence because the religion of Allah is not a game it's not something for anyone to come and contribute or write a post or say this is permissible and this is not it has to be done through knowledge it has to be done through evidence through the Quran and the Sunnah
